div.p: Saffron flower, also known as "the red gold of the East", contains antioxidants and anti-wrinkle properties.
Holy lotus is a symbol of purity, beauty and wisdom and is known for its soothing and caring properties.
Apply each morning onto a clean face. Sweep upwards in circular motions until fully absorbed.
